input_text:
Job Title: Field Engineer II - Heavy Civil

Location: Baltimore, MD

Employment Type: full-time

Listed Skills: Engineering, Information Technology

Description:
Want to learn more about this role and Jobot? Click our Jobot logo and follow our LinkedIn page!

Job details

Lead Field Engineer Opening with one of the world's largest construction companies!

This Jobot Job is hosted by Antonio Rey

Are you a fit? Easy Apply now by clicking the "Easy Apply" button and sending us your resume.

Salary $80,000 - $115,000 per year

A Bit About Us

Field Engineer II opening with one of the world's largest and most well-funded development teams. We focus on ground-up heavy civil, civil, and large commercial projects.

If you're a driven and dedicated professional with a passion for construction and a commitment to excellence, we want to hear from you. Apply today and take the next step in your career with our dynamic and growing company.



Why join us?


Benefits

Huge Growth PotentialEmployer Paid Healthcare BenefitsEmployee Ownership Program!Professional Development Impressive project base401k with employer matchPTOExcellent Annual/Project BonusesVehicle Package

Job Details

Responsibilities

 Assist in overseeing and managing all phases of civil construction projects, ensuring they are completed on time, within budget, and to the highest safety standards. Assist PM in developing detailed project plans, including schedules, cost estimates, and resource plans. Ensure all construction activities comply with safety regulations and company policies. Conduct site inspections to ensure adherence to engineering plans, specifications, and construction and safety standards. Coordinate with project managers, architects, engineers, and other construction professionals to guarantee effective communication and issue resolution. Prepare and submit detailed reports on project progress, costs, and issues. Assist in the development of construction procedures to guide construction staff and ensure project completion. Review project designs and contribute technical expertise in civil construction.

Qualifications

 Bachelor’s degree in Civil Engineering, Construction Management, or a related field is highly preferred. A minimum of 3+ years of experience in civil or heavy civil construction, with a strong focus on safety and cost estimation. In-depth understanding of construction procedures, materials, and project management principles. Excellent knowledge of safety regulations and procedures in the construction industry. Proven ability to prepare detailed cost estimates for civil construction projects. Strong leadership and project management skills. Excellent communication and interpersonal skills. Proficient in using construction management software and other relevant computer applications. Ability to work under pressure and solve complex problems.

Interested in hearing more? Easy Apply now by clicking the "Easy Apply" button.

Want to learn more about this role and Jobot?

Click our Jobot logo and follow our LinkedIn page!

Experience Level (if available): Entry level
